channel.title: Home on Kjanija
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Kjanija

item.title: Head Atlas
item.description: Researching attention head specialization and improving visualization via unsupervised dimensionality reduction

item.title: Demographic Fairness for Loan Approval
item.description: “Normative Fairness Shield” to enforce demographic parity in RL models. Using PPO and reward shaping, the framework monitors agent decisions in real-time and intervenes on biased rejections.

item.title: High-Performance 2D Head Diffusion Solver
item.description: A hybrid MPI and OpenMPI implementation of a 2D five-point stencil computation for simulating heat diffusion, featuring domain decomposition, performance profiling and scaling analysis

item.title: ECG Signal Denoising with EEMD and Genetic Algorithms
item.description: A ML pipeline designed to denoise ECG signals by combining EEMD to isolate frequency bands and a Genetic Algorithm to adaptively threshold and filter out noise

item.title: Education
item.description:
M.Sc. Data Science & AI (Current)

Focus: Foundations of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Projects with: pytorch, torch_geometric, streamlit, stable_baseline3, OpenMPI, OpenMP

B.Sc. AI & Data Analytics

Thesis: Noise Cancelling in ECG Signals using EEMD and Genetic Algorithms

My undergraduate work laid the groundwork in logic, physics, database systems and programming. It is during these three years that I further developed my skills working with numpy, pytorch, scikit, pandas, opemmp, docker, git while writing projects in python, C and R
